Package com.Akif

Class Data

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.Data
public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
This class keeps all data regarding the system in a nested Map. It also operate the data. It keeps data by using Set,Map and ArrayList. We wrote this class for reusable purpose, we will use this operations later.
